attributes.action: stop fraudulent expense claims by all MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the most recent revelation about Tony McNulty claiming £60000 of our taxpayers money for a second home which was in fact his parents home it is about time such expenses were outlawed without evidence of payment being made. In addition there should be a specific clause which excludes payment for use of any relatives home. This type of claim is tantamount to fraud and the British public are totally fed up with this sort of behaviour from public officials.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
